彜字的基本解释

彜
yí
同“彝”。

彜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yí］
［《廣韻》以脂切，平脂，以。］
“彛1”的新字形。亦作“彜1”。“彞1”的新字形。
(1)古代宗庙常用礼器的总名。
(2)专指盛酒的尊。
(3)常；常规；一成不变的法度。
(4)我国少数民族之一。分布于西南各省。详“彝族”。
(5)清代因避讳以“彝”代“夷”。见“彝場”、“彝猶”、“彝險”。

彜字的康熙字典解释

彜字的起名意思

暂无。

Yi
Basic explanation of words
Yi
yí
Same as "Yi".
Yi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yí］
["Guangyun" cut with fat, flat fat, with. ]
The new glyph of "彛1". Also known as "Yi 1". The new glyph of "彞1".
(1) The general name of the ritual vessels commonly used in ancient ancestral temples.
(2) Refers specifically to the god of wine.
(3) Constant; routine; unchanging laws.
(4) One of the ethnic minorities in our country. Distributed in the southwestern provinces. Detailed "Yi nationality".
(5) In the Qing Dynasty, "Yi" was substituted for "Yi" for avoiding taboo. See "Yichang", "Yiyou", "Yi Insurance".
